articles.author: Written by Ridhi Suri
articles.title: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui slams Priyanka Chopra for addressing Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy as 'South Asian' - India TV News
articles.description: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui called out Priyanka Chopra Jonas for addressing Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy as 'South Asian.' Read his tweet.
articles.content: Pakistani actor Adnan Siddiqui slammed Global star Priyanka Chopra Jonas for addressing Sharmeen Obaid Chinoy as 'South Asian'. The actress recently congratulated Pakistani director Sharmeen Obaid Ch… [+2679 chars]
